angelscript(zlib) svn co http://svn.code.sf.net/p/angelscript/code/trunk angelscript
assimp(3-clause BSD) git clone git://github.com/assimp/assimp.git assimp
bullet3(zlib) git clone https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3.git
libpng(zlib) git clone git://git.code.sf.net/p/libpng/code libpng
PhysicsFS(zlib) hg clone http://hg.icculus.org/icculus/physfs/ 
recastnavigation(zlib) git clone https://github.com/memononen/recastnavigation.git
SDL2.0(zlib) hg clone http://hg.libsdl.org/SDL
zlib(zlib) git clone https://github.com/madler/zlib.git

glLoadGen(MIT) hg clone https://bitbucket.org/alfonse/glloadgen
jsoncpp(MIT) git clone https://github.com/open-source-parsers/jsoncpp.git
libRocket(MIT) git clone https://github.com/libRocket/libRocket.git
entityx(MIT) git clone https://github.com/alecthomas/entityx.git


googlemock(2-Clause BSD) svn co http://googlemock.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ googlemock
sparsehash(2-Clause BSD) svn checkout http://sparsehash.googlecode.com/svn/trunk
libtheora(2-Clause BSD) svn co http://svn.xiph.org/trunk/theora/
libvorbis(2-Clause BSD) svn co http://svn.xiph.org/trunk/vorbis/

freetype(BSD-ish must give credit in doc/credits) git clone git://git.sv.nongnu.org/freetype/freetype2.git

openal-soft(LGPL V2) git clone git://repo.or.cz/openal-soft.git
